batchrequests

Interface BatchWriter<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - Type of the request that will be batched.

    public interface BatchWriter<T>
    The writer that will perform the batch write to the desired source. To be implemented by the client and injected in the BatchRequestsFactory.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void write(Collection<T> batchRequests)
      Write the collected batch to the desired source.

    • Method Detail

      • write

        void write(Collection<T> batchRequests)
        Write the collected batch to the desired source. Ensure that all exceptions (checked or unchecked) are caught and handled appropriately.
        Parameters:
        batchRequests - The requests that have been batched, to be written by this method.
